sentence.Network_en: Older workers can be as adaptable and quick to learn as anyone else.
sentence.Network_cn: 较年长的工人的适应能力和学习速度有时并不亚于其他任何人。

sentence.Network_en: Children are highly adaptable—they just need time to readjust.
sentence.Network_cn: 儿童的适应能力很强—他们只是需要时间重新适应。

sentence.Network_en: He is an adaptable man and will soon learn the new work.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个适应性很强的人,很快就将学会这种工作.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 形容人性格的词汇 ... able 有才干的，能干的； adaptable 适应性强的 active 主动的，活跃的；.

list.abs: 高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... habitat n 生活环境；栖息地 △ adapt vt 使适应；改编 adapt to 适应（新环境等）.
雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... acrylic 丙烯酸的 adapt 使适应 addict 使沉溺.
...视机(Tv)实现了二相插座的接口，现在我们定义一个适配器(Adapter)，这个适配器实现了三相插座的接口，所以它可以插在三相插座 …
英文面试常见问题 ... initiative 主动 adaptability 适应性 budget 预算.
一、适应(adaptation):当内外环境变动的时候，系统需要具备妥当的准备和相当的弹性，以适应新的变化来减轻紧张、磨擦的不良后果。

means.word_mean: 有弹性的,服从的,可塑的

entry.tran: 有适应能力的;能适应的;适应性强的
entry.def: If you describe a person or animal as adaptable, you mean that they are able to change their ideas or behaviour in order to deal with new situations.

example.tran: 一支适应能力及技能更强的劳动大军

example.ex: They are adaptable foragers that learn to survive on a wide range of food sources.
example.tran: 它们是适应能力很强的觅食者，赖以生存的食物来源很广。

means.word_mean: 1. capable of adapting (of becoming or being made suitable) to a particular situation or use;

sentences.sentence: "the frame was adaptable to cloth bolts of different widths"

auth_sentence.content: To succeed in life a man must be adaptable.
auth_sentence.res_content: To succeed in life a man must be adaptable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To succeed in life a man must be adaptable.

auth_sentence.content: Set up a list of specific criteria considered adaptable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Set up a list of specific criteria considered adaptable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Set up a list of specific criteria considered adaptable.

auth_sentence.content: The Taliban may be cruel but they are also adaptable.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Taliban may be cruel but they are also adaptable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Taliban may be cruel but they are also adaptable.

stems_affixes.word_buile: adapt适应+able能……的→adj.有适应能力的
apt适应,能力→adj.有倾向的,适当的
in无+apt能力→adj.不适当的;无能的
adapt[v.使适应,适应[环境]]+ation表名词→适应→适应[各种人]的书→改写本
apt适应,能力+itude性质,状态→有能力的状态
ad一再+apt适应,能力→一再适应[环境]

means.word_mean: 可适应的,有适应能力的

sentences.en: He is an adaptable man and will soon learn the new work.
sentences.cn: 他是个适应性很强的人，很快就将学会这种工作。

sentences.en: Successful businesses are highly adaptable to economic change.
sentences.cn: 成功的企业对于经济转变的适应能力很强。

sentences.en: Birds are very adaptable in their eating habits.
sentences.cn: 鸟的饮食习惯是非常有适应性的。

sentences.en: The soil is adaptable to the growth of peanuts.
sentences.cn: 这土壤适宜于花生的生长。

sentences.en: Many old market buildings have proved highly adaptable.
sentences.cn: 许多古老的市场建筑已经证明有很大的改建潜力。

sentences.en: The vehicles are large and not easily adaptable to new uses.
sentences.cn: 这些交通工具很大，不易改作新的用途。
